import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, CardText, CardFooter, CardTitle } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Reviews.css'; import Person1 from '../utils/img/person1.jpg'; import Person2 from '../utils/img/person2.jpg'; import Person3 from '../utils/img/person3.jpg'; import Person4 from '../utils/img/person4.jpg'; export function Reviews() { return (

Reviews

The croissants at Qui Qui Café are simply heavenly! Flaky and buttery, just the way they should be. Service was prompt, even during peak hours
John
Loved the artisanal touch on every dish—especially the quiche. The wait time was a bit longer than expected, but the flavors were worth it!
Maria Cruz
A great spot to relax and indulge in Parisian classics. The pain au chocolat was divine, though service could be a tad quicker
Anna Gold
Had a delightful lunch at Qui Qui Café! The ratatouille was fresh and flavorful. Service was friendly, though a bit slow during the lunch rush
Nick Burn
) }
